Title: patterns & practices: Prism Event Aggregator
Description: The Prism library provides loosely coupled pub/sub events using the Event Aggregator pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Prism library provides loosely coupled pub/sub events using the Event Aggregator pattern.

The Event Aggregator is a portable class library that runs on .NET 4.0 or higher, Silverlight 5, Windows Phone 8, and Windows Store apps (Windows 8) and higher.

For samples that use the event aggregator see the Event Aggregation QuickStart or Stock Trader RI from the Prism for WPF download or AdventureWorks Shopper RI from the Prism for the Windows Runtime download.

Where to get Event Aggregator Binaries

  • NuGet packages: Prism.PubSubEvents
